name: Aetheria: Lost
description:
(NOTE: Game has a game-breaking bug half way through. Update coming in a few hours--before 11:59PM EST, October 28)

This is Nchima's and Beau's Walking Simulator. You are placed in the ruins of Atheria and must find the magical apple and return it to its correct location. (left click to pick the apple up, right click to drop it) also you can right click to zoom when not holding the apple.
